Disallow: /1.x.x/
Disallow: /docs/1.x.x/
Disallow: /2.50.0-lts/
Disallow: /docs/2.50.0-lts/
Disallow: /3.0.0-lts/
Disallow: /docs/3.0.0-lts/
Disallow: /3.5.0-lts/
Disallow: /docs/3.5.0-lts/
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /search/

# Allow Algolia crawler
User-agent: Algolia
Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /
